doc:
Denis Arndt https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Denis_Arndt 0 Denis Arndt (born November 23, 1939) is an American actor, best known for his starring role as Alex Priest in the play Heisenberg for which he earned a 2017 Tony Award nomination for Best Actor in a Play. Denis_Arndt ( born November_23_,_1939 ) is an_American_actor , best_known for his_starring_role as Alex_Priest in the_play Heisenberg for which he earned a_2017_Tony_Award_nomination for Best_Actor in a_Play .
